scripts.base_base: while true; do npx sass Morningstar/static/base/css/base.scss Morningstar/static/base/css/base.css --no-source-map && echo '✔︎ build base/base.css'; sleep 5; done;
scripts.blog_base: while true; do npx sass apps/blog/static/blog/css/base.scss apps/blog/static/blog/css/base.css --no-source-map && echo '✔︎ build blog/base.css'; sleep 5; done;
scripts.lover_style: while true; do npx sass apps/lover/static/lover/css/style.scss apps/lover/static/lover/css/style.css --no-source-map && echo '✔︎ build lover/style.css'; sleep 5; done;
scripts.nav_style: while true; do npx sass apps/nav/static/nav/css/style.scss apps/nav/static/nav/css/style.css --no-source-map && echo '✔︎ build nav/style.css'; sleep 5; done;
scripts.build_css: npx concurrently "npm run base_tailwind" "npm run base_base" "npm run blog_tailwind" "npm run blog_base" "npm run lover_tailwind" "npm run lover_style" "npm run nav_tailwind" "npm run nav_style"  "npm run rss_tailwind"
